item.title: Limonade
item.description: The idea of microframeworks is an interesting new idea which appeared over the internet quite recently. The number of web frameworks available on internet is massive and many times i found myself puzzled about which one is the best one to use. Of course there are the ones i believe are the “classics” (django and ruby on rails) plus many minor ones. The first famous microframework was Sinatra, followed now by others.
